Tests for potentially problematic characters: those with on than one UTF-8 mapping

These pairs translate to the same ATASCII character
|â”‚ - 0x7c
â¹ğŸ®‡ - 0x02
ğŸ®‚âº - 0x0d
â½â–‚ - 0x0e
â€¢â— - 0x14
â–â¸ - 0x16

They need to work with the reverse video escape as well
`|`â”‚ - 0xfc
`â¹`ğŸ®‡ - 0x82
`ğŸ®‚`âº - 0x8d
`â½`â–‚ - 0x8e
`â€¢`â— - 0x94
`â–`â¸ - 0x96
